attributes.action: Abolition of VAT on electronic format books
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Standard paper books are not subject to VAT, but Electronic books (Ebooks) in such formats as epub are not zero rated.

Considering the new electronic formats are simply a modern container for the text/illustrations, and do not provide additional content or services apart from basics like dictionary lookup, there is no reason for them to be taxable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
